original_question: What illnesses are caused by damage to the alveoli of the lungs?
diverse_qns: Can you mention the diseases that result from damage to the alveoli of the lungs?

pred_ans: Respiratory failure, Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), Emphysema, Pneumoconiosis, Asthma
pred_ans_conf_OE: chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), pneumonia, and pulmonary fibrosis
